00128         public function boot(&$config) {
00129                 if(!$config instanceof MAIN_Config) {
00130                         throw MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Controller::boot', 'Invalid config.');
00131                 }
00132                 $this->config =& $config;
00133                 $this->logger = new MAIN_Logger();
00134 
00135                 // Get database options.
00136                 $dbopts   = $this->config->getOption('database');
00137                 if($dbopts === false) throw new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Controller::boot', "No database options.");
00138                 $server   = $dbopts['server'  ];
00139                 $username = $dbopts['username'];
00140                 $password = $dbopts['password'];
00141                 $database = $dbopts['database'];
00142 
00143                 // Start database, session, and cache while catching errors.
00144                 try {
00145                         $this->database = new DB_Database($server, $username, $password, $database, $this->logger);
00146                         $this->session = new OUT_Session();
00147                         $this->session->startSession();
00148                         $this->cache   = new MAIN_Cache($this->config, $this->session);
00149                 } catch(MAIN_Error $error) {
00150                         throw $error;
00151                 }
00152 
00153 
00154                 // Load models.
00155                 $models = $config->getOption('models');
00156                 foreach($models as $name => $value) {
00157                         $options = $value[0];
00158 
00159                         if(is_array($options)) {
00160                                 $protect = in_array("protect", $options);
00161                                 $parent  = in_array("parent",  $options);
00162                         } else {
00163                                 $protect = $parent = false;
00164                         } $this->newDatabaseObject($name, $protect, $parent);
00165                 } return true;
00166         }

00177         public function initiate() {
00178                 // Get action.
00179                 $actions = $this->config->getOption('actions');
00180                 $action  = $this->session->getText('action');
00181                 if(empty($action) && isset($actions['default'])) {
00182                         $action = $actions['default'];
00183                 }
00184 
00185                 // Try getting from the cache first.
00186                 if($this->cache->canBeCached($action) && !$this->cache->cacheExpired()) {
00187                         $this->cached = $this->cache->getCache();
00188                         return true;
00189                 } else {
00190                         // Get classname for action and make new request.
00191                         if(isset($actions[$action])) {
00192                                 $classname = $actions[$action];
00193                         } else {
00194                                 throw new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'MAIN_Controller::initiate', "Invalid request $action.");
00195                         } $this->request = new $classname($this->config, $this->database, $this->session);
00196 
00197                         // Initiate request.
00198                         return $this->request->initiate($this->session);
00199                 }
00200         }
00201 
00206         public function send() {
00207                 if(!isset($this->request)) {
00208                         throw new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'MAIN_Controller::send', "Request no set up.");
00209                 }
00210 
00211                 $cacheable = $this->cache->canBeCached($this->action);
00212                 $iscached  = empty($this->cached) || !$cacheable;
00213                 $cache     = $this->cached;
00214 
00215                 @ob_end_flush();
00216                 ob_start();
00217                 if(!$cacheable) {
00218                         $this->request->send();
00219                 } elseif(!$iscached) {
00220                         $this->request->send();
00221                         $this->cache->storeCache(ob_get_contents());
00222                 } else {
00223                         echo $this->cached;
00224                 }
00225         }

00233         public function cleanup() {
00234                 $debug = $this->config->getOption('debug');
00235                 if(($res = $this->database->close()) instanceof MAIN_Error) {
00236                         if($debug) {
00237                                 @ob_end_flush();
00238                         } else {
00239                                 @ob_end_clean();
00240                         } throw $res;
00241                 }
00242 
00243                 $paths = $this->config->getOption('paths');
00244                 $logpath = isset($paths['log']) ? $paths['log'] : ROOTDIR . '/log';
00245                 if(($res = $this->logger->export($logpath)) instanceof MAIN_Error) {
00246                         var_dump($res);
00247                         if($debug) {
00248                                 @ob_end_flush();
00249                         } else {
00250                                 @ob_end_clean();
00251                         } throw $res;
00252                 }
00253

00256                                 @ob_end_flush();
00257                         } else {
00258                                 @ob_end_clean();

00266         public function error($error) {
00267                 if(!$error instanceof MAIN_Error)
00268                         return false;
00269                 $this->action = 'error';

00290         private function newDatabaseObject($name, $protect = false, $parent = false) {
00291                 $protect = (int) $protect;
00292                 $parent  = (int) $parent;
00293                 $exec = "class $name extends DB_Object {\n" .
00294                         "\tprotected static \$parent = $parent;\n" .
00295                         "\tprotected static \$enableprotect = $protect;\n}";
00296                 eval($exec);
00297         }
